content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: I appreciate your interest in my apartment, Mr. Li. However, I am afraid that I cannot agree to the rental price you have proposed. It is not within my budget and does not reflect the value of the apartment. I would be happy to discuss further if you are willing to make an adjustment to your offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a rental price of 1000 Euros per month. This is a fair and reasonable price based on the location and size of the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
What about 850 Euros per month?
/
TERMINATE
name: Bo Li from China

content: I apologize for the misunderstanding, Mr. Li. However, I must say that I am unable to accept the rental price of 850 Euros per month. It is lower than what I was expecting and does not reflect the value of the apartment. I would be happy to continue the negotiation if you are willing to make an adjustment to your offer.
name: Heinrich Heine
